fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, shoot a player. 3 charges.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you shoot a player of the same faction as your target, you lose all charges and kill yourself.
- At the start of the game, you're given a target. You aren't told their role or faction, just their name.
- If your target dies at night, your target's killer is your new target. If they were killed by multiple people, a random killer is chosen. This can only happen two times; after that you kill yourself.
- **__Part of the Daily Streak faction.__**

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to win with your target.
